title: Firewall error?
body: Since last update there have been a lot of connection issues. Right now can't connect to the game after 10 attempts of restarting client and restarting PC twice. Yet server status says it's online. Fix please, if there are server issues bring them down. Don't make me queue up just to be stuck in the loading screen.

replies.body:
Hi,

We're aware of an issue with the servers at the moment - please see [this thread](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/IOuWqG7B-troubleshooting-connection-issues-4032015) on our boards for how to help.

Cheers
